docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Reagan Administration has issued a new rule that it says will probably increase the costs of nursing home care for hundreds of thousands of low-income people who are elderly or disabled.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: PEDDLERS have been seeking baldness cures about as long as alchemists tried to turn base metals into gold. But while the alchemists gave up some time ago, the anti-baldness forces now seem to be hitting their stride.
